name: Ext_R3_AllergyIntolerance_re_manifestation
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.AllergyIntolerance.reaction.manifestation for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents AllergyIntolerance.reaction.manifestation from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/AllergyIntolerance|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Clinical symptoms/signs associated with the Event
element.definition: Clinical symptoms and/or signs that are observed or associated with the adverse reaction event.
element.comment: `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.manifestation` maps to R5 `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.manifestation`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: Clinical symptoms/signs associated with the Event
element.definition: Clinical symptoms and/or signs that are observed or associated with the adverse reaction event.
element.comment: `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.manifestation` maps to R5 `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.manifestation`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: Clinical symptoms and/or signs that are observed or associated with an Adverse Reaction Event.
